participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Curious and nurturing, with a love for stories and learning.
participant_1.background: i am 60years old. i think i'll retire in a few years. i'm a librarian. i've visited spain a times. i really like to travel.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and motivational, always looking to inspire others.
participant_2.background: i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i love running and preparing for marathons. i am a clean eater. i'm a cancer survivor. my parents were both very athletic.
